categories: Category:Articles with elements from unlicensed sources

nodes.text: The Lady with the Locust Heart was an evil deity worshiped by the cult of the Five, whom Suzal mentioned to Han Solo.

In the cancelled Hyperspace article Cult Encounters of the Star Wars Universe by Joseph Bongiorno, the Lady with the Locust Heart is identified with the Scorekeeper, the Dancing Goddess, the Vain Goddess, and Onrai. In the follow-up novella Supernatural Encounters: The Trial and Transformation of Arhul Hextrophon, also by Joseph Bongiorno, Onrai is revealed to be a guise of Abeloth.
